Plot: A videographer captures an engaged couple's decision to proceed with a sham wedding after the bride calls off the ceremony and decides to break up with her partner, who secretly hopes that his surprise gift will ultimately change her mind.
Title: Breakup at a Wedding
Writer: Anna Martemucci, Philip Quinaz, Victor Quinaz
Actors: Alison Fyhrie, Philip Quinaz, Mary Grill, Chris Manley
